actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the Merchant Marine Act, 1920, in order to provide that the coastwise laws shall extend to the Virgin Islands with respect to the transportation of crude oil, residual fuel oil, and refined petroleum products.

summary.text: Amends the Merchant Marine Act to extend coastwise shipping laws with respect to the transportation of crude oil, residual fuel oil, and refined petroleum products to the Virgin Islands.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Merchant Marine Act, 1920, in order to provide that the coastwise laws shall extend to the Virgin Islands with respect to the transportation of crude oil, residual fuel oil, and refined petroleum products.
